name: Irish Lamb Stew
description: This deliciously cozy recipe features tender chunks of lamb, potatoes, and carrots in a rich red wine infused broth. It’s sure to impress at less than $2 a serving!
preparation: Season lamb with Salt and Pepper. Preheat frying pan to high, add 1 1⁄2 tbsp vegetable oil and brown lamb on all sides.
Heat Multipurpose Pot to medium. Add remaining vegetable oil and sauté onions for about 5 minutes, being careful not to brown. Stir in lamb seasoning and Minced Garlic.
Pour red wine into pot, stir vigorously and reduce by half. Add Vegetable Bouillon and browned lamb and heat until simmering.
Add carrots and potatoes, cover and gently simmer until vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Season to taste and serve.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Minced Garlic
summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.
